p: Preclinical evidence. This herbal medicine has been experimentally proven for symptoms of respiratory disease, namely productive cough ( Hong et al., 2015; Pizzorno et al., 2016). Other related experimental effects include acute and chronic bronchitis, asthma, and pneumonia ( Hong et al., 2015; Pizzorno et al., 2016). The H. helix extract and isolated compounds exerted a spasmolytic effect in isolated guinea-pig ileum ( Trute et al., 1997).
